definition: classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

pinyin: lu:4 du2 tong1 feng1 zhuang1 zhi4

sentences.english: E. If the enclosing sides adjoin each other, the area should be properly vented.
sentences.chinese: 如果封閉的側面彼此鄰接，該區域要有適當的通風。

sentences.english: Drafty a standard that is quality of evaluation living space.
sentences.chinese: 通風良好是評價居住空間質量的一個標準。

sentences.english: We had to stuff the ventilator shafts up to stop the smoke entering the room.
sentences.chinese: 爲了阻止煙進入室內，我們只好把通風道堵起來。

sentences.english: The initial stabilization for a leaking cylinder containing corrosives is isolation in a well-ventilated area.
sentences.chinese: 第一步是把裝有腐蝕劑的鋼瓶隔離在通風良好的區域。

sentences.english: Bottle upright, away from the light, in a cool ventilated place.
sentences.chinese: 直立儲藏於避光陰涼通風處。

sentences.english: The aeration and heat calculations of machine are very complex, and the results are not very veracious.
sentences.chinese: 電機的通風發熱計算較複雜，一般計算準確度較差。

sentences.english: Connect the vent hose to the axle shaft tube.
sentences.chinese: 向主動軸管上連接通風管。

sentences.english: It must be used in the room with good airiness.
sentences.chinese: 必須在通風條件好的房間裏使用。

sentences.english: Ultra padded air mesh back panel with ventilation channels.
sentences.chinese: 超軟墊空中網後面板上的通風通道。

sentences.english: The overall equipment is composed of top cover, left and right plates, rear and front door plates and ventilation trough.
sentences.chinese: 整體設備由頂蓋，左右側板，前後門板及通風槽組成。

sentences.english: S38:In case of insufficient ventilation, wear suitable respiratory equipment.
sentences.chinese: 通風不良時，須佩戴適當的呼吸器。

sentences.english: This article gives a detailed introduction to the conception of the project, the setting of ventilation shafts, etc.
sentences.chinese: 對自然通風的方案構思，通風井的設置等作詳細介紹。

sentences.english: This article gives a detailed introduction to the conception of the project, the setting of ventilation shafts, etc.
sentences.chinese: 對自然通風的方案構思，通風井的設置等作詳細介紹。

sentences.english: The "Crows Nest" has screened venting to provide additional ventilation.
sentences.chinese: 在“烏鴉巢”的甄別，以提供額外的排氣通風。

sentences.english: Ventilation below ground is poor and deadly accidents occur almost daily.
sentences.chinese: 地下的通風條件極差，幾乎每天都有死亡事故。

definition: air conditioning/air conditioner (including units that have a heating mode)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
to flow freely (of air)/to ventilate/to breathe (of fabric etc)/to take a breath of fresh air/to divulge
